content: **important note ** this pattern is available for free on my youtube channel 1 but if you want the printable pdf version you can find that here the cascades cowl is an easy cowl pattern made for beginners if you know how to cast on knit and purl you can make this scarf i have a link in the pattern to my full video tutorial available for free on my youtube channel that teaches you the steps for the stitch pattern how to bind off how to join in the round and how to weave in your ends this cowl is so easy to make and i find the stitch pattern to be really fun to work with **materials** yarn - worsted weight approx **length a ** 165 yds 151 m **length b ** 225 yds 206 m *sample uses yarn bee soft & sleek 100% low pill acrylic - 232yds/142g the long sample is in the colorway brownie and the short sample is in the colorway spice * **needles** us 8 5 0 mm 16″ or 24″ 40 or 60 cm circular needles *or size needed to match gauge * **other materials** yarn needle stitch marker **gauge** *openwork rib stitch see below worked in the round * 18 sts / 25 rounds = 4″ 10 cm *openwork rib stitch note work in the round multiple of 4 stitches * rounds 1-5 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 6 *yo skp p2 repeat from * around **sizing** *rounded to the nearest 0 25″ 0 5 cm * circumference 25 75″ 65 5 cm length a shorter 8 5″ 21 5 cm length b longer 12 25″ 31 cm *note in the pattern the instructions will be written for length a b example work 7 11 repeats would be 7 for length a and 11 for length b * this pattern has not been tech edited or test knit there may be small errors because i m only human if you find one or have any questions send me an email bluemouseshop@gmail com 1 https //bit ly/cascadesvideo
